Title: Coco Before Chanel
Writer: Edmonde Charles-Roux (book), Anne Fontaine, Camille Fontaine
Actors: Audrey Tautou, Benoît Poelvoorde, Alessandro Nivola, Marie Gillain
Plot: Several years after leaving the orphanage to which her father never returned for her, Gabrielle Chanel finds herself working in a provincial bar. She's both a seamstress for the performers and a singer, earning the nickname Coco from the song she sings nightly with her sister. A liaison with Baron Balsan gives her an entrée into French society and a chance to develop her gift for designing increasingly popular hats. When she falls in love with English businessman Arthur Capel further opportunities open up, though life becomes ever more complicated.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 19 nominations.
Production: France 2 (FR2), Le Tax Shelter du Gouvernement Fédéral de Belgique, France 2 Cinéma, Films Distribution, Banque Populaire Images 9, SCOPE Invest, Warner Bros., Soficapital, Cofinova 5, Haut et Court, Canal+, Ciné, Scope Pictures, CinéCinéma
